select * from data_log where 1 = 1
and ip like concat('%',#{sSearch},'%')
select target_url as name,count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by target_url order by `count` desc
select target_url as name,count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by target_url,ip order by `count` desc
select date(date_time) as 'date',count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by date(date_time) order by `count` desc
select target_url as name,referer,count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by target_url,referer order by `count` desc
select referer as name,count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by `name` order by `count` desc
select target_url as 'name',date(date_time) as 'time',count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by target_url,`time` order by `count` desc
select target_url as 'name',month(date_time) as 'time',count(1) as 'count' from data_log group by target_url,`time` order by `count` desc
